overview_of_class: Chem 212-1 is the first quarter of a three-quarter sophomore organic chemistry sequence. Topics Include: Orbitals, Structure of Molecules, Acid-Base Chemistry, Introduction to Spectroscopic Techniques for Structure Elucidation, the Chemistry of the Carbonyl Group, Stereochemistry and Conformational Analysis.
name: Organic Chemistry
title: WCAS CHEM 212-1-01 Organic Chemistry
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 232-1.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Chem 212-1 is the first quarter of a three-quarter sophomore organic chemistry sequence. Topics Include: Orbitals, Structure of Molecules, Acid-Base Chemistry, Introduction to Spectroscopic Techniques for Structure Elucidation, the Chemistry of the Carbonyl Group, Stereochemistry and Conformational Analysis.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: 103 or 172 (C- or better) or equivalent; AP score of 5; IB score of 7; or qualifying score on the Chemistry Placement Exam (available only to incoming first-year students).

Students enrolled in this course MUST also enroll in the associated laboratory course, Chemistry 232-1.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Organic Chemistry by Clayden et al., 2nd Edition, Oxford Univ Press ($170.95 new; $128.20 used)*

*Prices as listed by the Norris Bookstore on 6/23/16. Prices offered by other vendors may be lower.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value:
1. Solutions Manual to Accompany Organic Chemistry by Clayden et al, 2nd Edition, Oxford Univ Press ($49.95 new; $37.45 used)*
2. Molecular Modeling Kit ($TBD)

*Prices as listed by the Norris Bookstore on 6/23/16. Prices offered by other vendors may be lower.

subject: CHEM
